title: MW4 Mercs Super Map Pack Collection (works with any version of M
description:
This is a collection of *all* of the major map packs available for Mechwarrior 4 : Mercenaries that I am aware of, including:

BKV (Black Knight/Vengeance)
MWL 1-3 (MechWarriorLeague)
NB/NBT (New Battlegrounds)
SoE (Sword of Empyrion)

This will cover nearly all (99%+) of the maps used online, barring those made by individual players.  These maps are, however, only usable in multiplayer and Instant Action play; you can't use them in the single-player campaign.

You will need a playable version of Mechwarrior 4: Mercenaries to use these maps, although any version from PR1 on should work just fine.  This torrent also contains NONE of the game files.  You can find a working install many places, or you can download a full version of .0030c (the last version of the MekTek Free Release version) at: http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/9771883, if you care to.

Enjoy.
